website_summaries.verdict: Wireless earbuds with a long battery life and high-quality bass.
pros: Connect wirelessly to any Bluetooth-enabled device
Hands-free calling available with virtual assistant
cons: Some issues falling out of ears during high-impact activities

customer_reviews.title: Buy these
customer_reviews.text: Reference the attached picture to see how they're supposed to be worn. They will probably not fall out of your ears if you wear them like this. Great headphones. I bought two pairs of JBLs, both were trash
customer_reviews.author: This is Not Dan

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is there
customer_reviews.text: I have had many brands of headphones over 50 years . These are one of the best . Great bass , comfortable and well made. price is great . I tried a pair for $100 of another brand and they did not come close to these. I would buy them again. No question.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Duniphin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!
customer_reviews.text: These are horrible product!! Very disappointed with Sony! The music sounds good but sound quality for talking is awful! Voice is so distorted and unclear!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi M.

customer_reviews.title: Decent Quality For the Price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are a very good quality product. Battery holds a charge and recharges very quickly. Sound quality is fine. I wish the flashing blue light could be dimmed or turned off completely though. It doesn’t flash constantly, only when the power turns on and the Bluetooth connection is made; it’s just REALLY bright in a dark room. I also wish auto shut off didn’t include a voice announcing that the device is being powered off. I purposefully sleep with earbuds in, and the voice wakes me up when the device turns off. A simple click or soft beep would be better.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Really amazing battery life
customer_reviews.text: Using it for almost two month. The battery life is really amazing. I for get to charge two days and it still work well. Really recommend people who is usually forget to charge it. It’s having one weakness, microphone. Every time when I want to speak, I need to take the microphone(in the back of control panel.) it can’t catch sound very well. If microphone work well, I will give it 5 Star
customer_reviews.author: CHENG-CHIEH HUANG

customer_reviews.title: Where do I start?
customer_reviews.text: Pros - easy to pair with my Ipod Touch Cons - Bass is non-existent. - Super annoying cord - very low sound - They are not noise cancellation - Way overpriced. These headphones should def be in the 10-20 dollar price range. - Will not pair with PC, notebook or tablet. - Would have returned them but now I use them as a backup pair if my new Sennheisers are broken. - Bottom lined DON"T EVEN THINK OF BUYING THESE!
customer_reviews.author: Everett Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cheap counterfeits!  Sound like something that came with a child's toy!
customer_reviews.text: Guys, this product advertises 12mm drivers, which should, indeed, put a lot of bass into one's ears. However, they sound like the cheapest earbuds that might come with a child's toy -- just so it works. You would not want to listen to these unless you had no other choice!! I should have noticed the cheap prices on used pairs. I thought maybe Sony was lowering the price because pure wireless are the new way to go. No! Someone figured out how to make something extremely cheap look very authentic. Shame on whoever sold them! One try, and you'd see right away these cannot be genuine Sony product.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as advertised - lots of thumping bass sound. Quite tricky to setup and pair with your device though (it took my xperia phone about a minute to detect it), but once its paired everything is a-ok.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Sim

customer_reviews.title: Great step up from starter headphones, all worthy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a step from the average $30 headphones and these ones deliver. Impressive, clear sound. Very comfortable. Style is fine, nothing fancy. Great battery life. The lanyard is quite long. Thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Pepe Catala

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great but the design sucks
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound and the battery life of these ear buds, however there is one major drawback, the two large pod things that hang down, keep pulling your earbuds out. I have to constantly put them back on which is a major deal breaker.. I wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sony Gouldbourne

customer_reviews.title: Maybe next time.
customer_reviews.text: Are they worth getting? Not for $60 they are not. The build quality is great. They don't feel cheap and the magnetic ends are a great choice. But there are both minor and major issues that make the price difficult to justify. They will slide from side to side. The sound quality, tone/bass, is on par with cheaper headphones. No vibration at all. But the biggest issue is the white noise in the background. Somehow the Mpow Jaws Gen5 doesn't have these issues and it's at a lower price. If the next version addresses these issues, I would get them. But for now, wait for them to drop in price to $35-40 or get the Mpow Jaws Gen5.
customer_reviews.author: Yuri

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality - value price.
customer_reviews.text: Ok I am a real consumer, hard to know what reviews are real. Just got these Sony CB 400 Tonight- They Sound Awesome! Have not tested battery life yet or noise cancelation. But out of the box they sound great. I already own BOSE Soundsports - very comparable sound. I’m using BOSE for exercise - they hold in my ear securely and sound great. For the price I bought these for outside work. Very happy with the sound quality! Before the Sony’s I tried the Taotronics Soundelite 72 Sports - GARBAGE. Very tinny sounding- no base at all. They advertised their 3 different equalizer settings - it did nothing for me! Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and value
customer_reviews.text: Lovely bass. Excellent high volume and tonality. However, enjoying drowning out the world at high volume means others near you can hear your audio. But for this price and the quality of sound and bass I will give this a pass. Comes with adjustable earpieces. Usually I need the smallest but the mid size that came pre-attached was actually pretty comfortable even for my small ears. The wire is flat and thicker than a couple others I have tried. This should help it roll against the skin less while moving. Battery life is always an issue with any Bluetooth product for music, but so far so good. I appreciated it came fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: Wai’tukubuli

customer_reviews.title: Great Sony wireless ieps
customer_reviews.text: These phone arrived 2 days early and in new packaging. They were completely charged in an hour (when the red charging light went off). They quickly linked to my Samsung A 50 and really sound terrific. Great bass, sound stage and high clarity. I expect they will sound even better as they break in. They do cost a bit more than the field of $20 wireless bluetooth ieps, but the quality is obvious, especially at the charging port, activity buttons and connective wire. I think that a number of dissatisfaction reviews probably come from poorly downloaded material. Most of my my music (rock, classical and jazz) are FLAC and the clarity is obvious. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Levey

customer_reviews.title: Some white noise in the background
customer_reviews.text: These earphones definitely have great bass and a high range of volume, but I’ve noticed a distinct white noise/background static both when no audio is playing or hidden in the background of audio. I am not sure if this is normal or if I simply have a defective pair; if the manufacturer could reach out and let me know I would appreciate it. The white noise isn’t really a deal breaker, but for both the company namesake and the price I did hope for a little better. Overall the earphones are good for the price and unless some other issue comes up or the manufacturer offers a replacement if the white noise isn’t normal, I will probably keep this pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall M.

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery life !
customer_reviews.text: I am a Sony fan. Received this product on 23 March, 2020. Sound quality is good and has a good bass, no doubt about that. Sony claims battery life to be 15 hours of playback which is my main reason behind buying these earbuds. I have to charge after every 3-4 hrs of music playback. After first hour of music battery drops to 70%. 15hrs of playback, my earbuds are nowhere near it. Highly disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Singh

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound and battery life but the strap doesn't stay in place
customer_reviews.text: These sound great to me, but they slide to one side or the other on my next all of the time and makes them uncomfortable until I recenter the strap. This makes it hard to use while running or doing anything with my hands where I have to clean my hands or remove gloves to readjust the strap. I've also found that for me, personally because of my big beard, that the microphone is unusable for calls because any left/right movement of my head causes my beard to rub over the mic and make a scratch sounds. Again, this isn't really an issue with the product in general, just something to think about if you have a long beard.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Nah get the Beats by Dre
customer_reviews.text: These really suck! They can’t stay on your neck properly and are moving around all over the place. I guess it’s because of the poor design and the weight of the battery. Because of this the rating is very low and I’d trade battery life for ones with shorter battery life but actually stay on my next. Beats beat these all day.
customer_reviews.author: keepitup2

customer_reviews.title: Great sound,  but buds poke out and hurt my ears.
customer_reviews.text: Ok I LOVE THE SOUND. ONE CON. THEY ARE HUGE AND POKE OUT. I can't sleep in them, or keep in very long without them hurting. I bought other bluetooth earbuds and gave these to my husband who has bigger earholes lol. They however hurt his ears after wearing for prolonged periods of time. So it's not just me.
customer_reviews.author: Kell87

customer_reviews.title: Sony made a nice product with these.
customer_reviews.text: These are very good, they have great battery life, they are USB-C charging battery is lasting approximately 13-15 if not longer then that. They sit nicely around the neck area. These magnets on the back side of the ear pieces so they sit well together. I use these everyday and I have no complaints at all. These are not noise canceling but I wasn’t going for that feature with these. At this price point these really do the trick for my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: ricanpone529

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth connectivity is not as good as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: So far, I am happy with the quality of the sound they provide. However, I notice that if I am walking around the house cleaning, sometimes the connection is a little bit choppy and other time it seems fine in the same distance. So not sure why that happens. It is also a bit tricky wearing them while working out. Ear buds keep coming out of my ears but o guess that is to be expected with the activity that I am doing.
customer_reviews.author: Tsquare

customer_reviews.title: Good headphon with some areas of improvement
customer_reviews.text: This is a good wireless earbud. But there are few problems. First the meterial of the wire which is expected to stay over the neck doesn't do the job. It frequently slips. And secondly to start the headphone you have to press and hold the button too long. I used one bose, which was very convenient in this matter. Also one more firmware related issue. It doesn't tell you the exact battery percentage. It tells only fully charged, 70%, 50% and need recharge. It's little awkward nowadays from a Sony product.
customer_reviews.author: Arupananda Jana

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds sound great. These do need a break-in period so give it a couple days of regular use and the sounds will balance out just fine. The bass is perfect because too many earbuds are just plain weak in that frequency. These are lightweight and perfect for my jogs and lawn chores. Quality does seem good, so I hope these last as long as my LG's did.
customer_reviews.author: z28junkie

customer_reviews.title: Finally...the search is over
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling to find d a good pair of headphones for months now. I've tried several styles and brands and I'm happy to have finally found everything I'm looking for in one package. This one is sweat proof, blocks outside sounds so its good for the gym and cutting grass and the volume it loud enough which was my biggest complaint for most other kinds i tried. They are also very comfortable and barley need any adjustment, even when you are active. I would say the sound is HD and more than I expected to get from a relatively cheap pair of phones.
customer_reviews.author: GEEKBOT5000

customer_reviews.title: good but i got a defective unit
customer_reviews.text: sound quality: good for price. you won’t regret it for what you pay. whether you like vocal or bass, this is a good choice for the bucks noise canceling: not designed for, but if you choose the right eartips, it’ll block a considerable amount of ambient noise battery life: exceptional! less than 1 hour charging for 15 hours of playing non-stop overall? if yours is not a defective like mine, which keeps automatically adjusting the volume back and forth by 1 unit, this is great. and yes i’ve sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: chris lai

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality of these is good. The bass response is definitely noticeable. I have not drained the battery to test the claimed 15 hours. I do like that when you turn these on the voice prompt gives you an approximate remaining battery life (100%, 70%, 50%, battery low). The down side to these is the weight of the controller and what I assume is the battery compartment. This is based on owning other Bluetooth earbuds with a smaller control module. Overall these are comfortable and I am content with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rich in WA

customer_reviews.title: Small but difficult to keep on your neck
customer_reviews.text: I like how small these are. They sound great and the noise canceling works great as they seal up nice on your ears. BUT...The magnet stinks! It is so weak they don't hold the buds together unless you place them exactly on each other, and they will pop apart at any random time. The design is not that good for keeping the two sides of the wire evenly on your neck, as one side will hang down and then pull on just one ear. I'm not that happy with them. It's just not a good design. Great battery life, connects up sometimes quickly, other times you have to work at it.
customer_reviews.author: Mattel

customer_reviews.title: Speaker already worn out in right bud
customer_reviews.text: I would like to leave an overall positive review if it werent for the fact that the right bud developed a slight buzzing sound, which has only gotten worse. Pretty bad for only having them for a few days. First day of use was at half volume for around 12 hours after 3 hour charge. Towards the end of that day it started buzzing slightly. Now its an audible rattle and I'm rally disappointed because they had great dynamic range and decent battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob McCubbin

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for AirPods
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of my AirPods falling out and having to find them. I was concerned that I might lose one while exercising, so I purchased these headphones. They are comfortable and easy to use. The instructions that came with them do not include how to pair them to my device. Plenty of warnings and how to reset them, but no basic instructions for pairing!
customer_reviews.author: Kent Slade

customer_reviews.title: FIVE STARS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have NEVER liked ear buds... call it a sensory issue. But these... oh I can't live without them now! They are amazing! I wear them on the treadmill cuz my over the ear headphones made too much sweat. Not good! And when I wear them it's like the rest of the world doesn't exist! Plus the bass is amazing in these tiny things! I'm so expressed! I paid 58 but now they are 38! I would pay 58 again! But ordered a back up pair ❤ Update... still 5 STARS! SO easy to connect to anything and sounds amazing! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Storms

customer_reviews.title: Best in price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are fantastic earbuds. I learned from a previous pair (different company) to use the sponge red (or black) ear cushions you can order after-market on Amazon for $6. The sponge ear cushions allow these earbuds to seat better in your ears, and when they expand in your ears they cancel outside noise contamination much more efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick R. Whelan

customer_reviews.title: Great battery and Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I have a sony wired ear buds. Currently smart phones are becoming wireless for earphones. When this went on sale on holidays, I took advantage of it. Pros: - Battery life lasted 2 days on casual music listening at work - Bass was surprisingly well vs my wired Sony Megabass ear buds - USB-C charging head is a great thing as both my 2 phones are using USB-C chargers Cons: - Cable too long. they need to put a way to attach to neck collar so not moving. - MIC was position way too far so it is a problem to hear you on the other side
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Extra Bass is no Joke
customer_reviews.text: Dang these are impressive for the money. Never had any connection issues, battery life is great, sound quality is fantastic (I wouldn't call my sell an audiophile, but I'm a musician and do have a lot of experience with all sorts of sound equipment). The extra bass really punches hard, you can almost feel it in your head. That being said, it may not be for everyone, as it does make the EQ slightly imbalanced. But I use them to listen to metal while working out, so they've been great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cheeks2184

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality. Gr8 Music Sound !!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the headphones less a month ago. Music sound quality is above par. However call quality is muffled and attenuated. Build quality is below par (as per Sony standards). The stems just tear off (as shown in pic). Have requested for replacement. Will send review again once I receive the replacement. Edit : 2 weeks of usage of replacement, same issue. Wouldn’t recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn-The-Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound but Hard to keep around your neck
customer_reviews.text: Great Sound and Initial Battery life. Forget about trying to use Only one earbud....I Typically only wear one while at Work, so I can still hear whatever is around me....but, even w/ both earbuds in, they don't stay well around your neck, they Easily Travel to one side or the other, Highly Annoying! But....Since I Somehow LOST them, after only about 4 days......they slipped off my shoulders w/out me realizing, & I have No Clue Where. Money Well Wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great if you don't move
customer_reviews.text: Sound - Excellent. Battery life - Outstanding. Moving around... doing anything - not so much. From cleaning out my car to moving around at work, these will fall out of your ears due to the cord being a little too long. I use them while I sleep and its ok till i find something else. If you plan on sitting around doing nothing... these are great. Plan on taking a jog or working around the house... keep looking and save yourself a return.
customer_reviews.author: Just A Guy

customer_reviews.title: Battery units can shift around
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to get these to hang properly in place around the neck. If I use them while, say, doing the dishes, I find one of the battery bits can shift and pull the opposite earbud out. For that reason, I can really only use these when I’m sitting still with both ear buds in. Otherwise, they sound better than cheaper earbuds and the battery life is exceptional. I hadn’t seen this mentioned yet, so I thought I’d put it out there in case this would be an issue for any potential buyers. Maybe I have weird shoulders?
customer_reviews.author: Buckley W.

customer_reviews.title: These really sound pretty good and battery life is good too.
customer_reviews.text: I do think the cord is too long, as others have mentioned. I really like the sound quality and decent battery life. I ended up buying 2. The only thing that prevents it, from my perspective, from being a 5 is the occasional loss of Bluetooth connectivity w/my TV. I have to power it off and back on again and it reconnects to the TV instantly. Yes, it does auto-connect to my TV, I don't have to go into the bluetooth settings on my TV every time I use these earbuds, which I really appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: SonoraTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Honest review
customer_reviews.text: Honest review. these headphone sound really good. Very clear Audio , bass is noticeable compared to regular headphones but not as loud as you would expect but still acceptable. Making calls is easy and sound quality clear as well. Overall in my opinion I give it an 8.9/10 the price Is fair. So I would recommend you buying it if you have a couple bucks to spend. If not might wanna find cheaper or more expensive ones to fit your taste or to just save a bit more money
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Died within a month
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was acceptable and the battery lasts forever. Really good range too. I walked almost 100 yards from my phone before they started losing the connection. The problem is they have terrible connectivity issues. Constantly dropping the connection or randomly powering off. Many glitches causing me to have to reset them. One day they just turned off on their own and never came back on. Dead in less than a month.
customer_reviews.author: C. Voisin

customer_reviews.title: Awkward with phony bass
customer_reviews.text: Simply a bad headphone. Cons: The gigantic cord with two weird (and LARGE) pods that hang down makes them awkward to wear - and pulls them out of your ears. The magnets suck too, as does the sound with over the top BASS. Pros: USB-C... that is all
customer_reviews.author: Savedsol

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.  Very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: I finally found some wireless earbuds that sound great. I should have stick with Sony rather than looking at other brands when shopping for wireless. I already have the wired XB50AP and I am very happy with the sound and bass they provide. I got today the XB400 and they have the same quality as the wired version. I even found the XB400 more comfortable to wear. So happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Eric Mas

customer_reviews.title: Not A good Earbuds_Bad sound_and horrible Call quality
customer_reviews.text: I was highly disappointed with this Sony Product. Sony Wi-Xb400 Wireless In-Ear headphone is a cheap quality. Sound quality is not good and it has a horrible call quality. The microphone is faulty. While using a microphone for call and Siri assistance, I can hear my own and weird noise. People receiving call also complaint about rumbling noise. I would not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Rachana

customer_reviews.title: Good wireless in-ear phone.
customer_reviews.text: Pros : What i like about this headphone is 1.Audio quality 2.Battery life 15hrs. 3.Fits your ear nicely. 4.Type C charging. Cons : 1.When you are in call ,if you receive any other call(say from Whatsapp) it switches to phone, link to head phone is lost. 2. When you have to take the call , you really have to search the on better or volume rocker as its in your left side of your ear - not user friendly ,( I guess it will be useful for left handed person) 3. no water proof - but its ok ,not a deal breaker. Overall Good head phone.
customer_reviews.author: Howwazzit

customer_reviews.title: Expensive earplugs
customer_reviews.text: Good noise cancelation and battery that's it. Massive connection issues. Will just disconnect randomly all the time and like cuts in and out because super weak signal with these. So basically they expensive earplugs. WORST HEADPHONES I'VE EVER HAD! Now all of a sudden they will connect to stuff and play no sound so the only sound they play is the headphones stuff. Save your money and buy $20 headphones they better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Dilley

customer_reviews.title: Horrible static noise
customer_reviews.text: When you switch on the headset, there will be a constant static/buzzing/white noise. It will only go away when it auto shutoff audio when nothing is playing. I thought I got a defective set so I ordered replacement, and the replacement set does the same thing. I have several cheaper no-brand name wireless Bluetooth headphones and non of them have this issue. This is pretty ridiculous for a Sony product. When you play loud music, it will cover the noise and the sound quality is great and you will definitely notice the extra bass. But if you intend to use this for phone call, then the static noise will be very obvious and very annoy.
customer_reviews.author: AK LEE

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new phone and was really looking forward to having wireless earbuds for working out. These always fall out especially when going for a jog, even just walking. I've tried all 3 sizes and it's just not a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Has lot of disturbance
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the wur*t products ever ... The sound quality is so poor and there is lot of disturbance in the year if the cable shakes .. It frequently disconnects from the call , and sometimes even the call is not transferred back to phone , until you turnoff the Bluetooth . This is the second device I purchased from sony - both have exact same issues , even after an year . PLease take a lesson from apple or other small brands ... Goodbye to Sony products .....
customer_reviews.author: venkat

customer_reviews.title: Sony is still King
customer_reviews.text: These are the best Bluetooth earbuds I have ever gotten!!! I had several other pairs I received as gifts but none come close to the sound clarity of Sony. My only gripe is you can't skip or go back from the cord but it's all about the sound . I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Walter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for price! Didn’t need anything fancy or expensive, but having to get up and down a lot at work - the wireless makes it much more convenient. Love the navy blue color and love that the ear pieces are magnetic.
customer_reviews.author: JRM

customer_reviews.title: These were so bad I was happy when they started failing 2 months after I bought them.
customer_reviews.text: You cannot appreciate how chunky the main plastic pieces on these are until you try to walk around with them on. If you’re the type of user, like myself, who likes his headphones to stay in his ears then with this style you must cross them under your chin contrary to how the ad shows them being used. Unfortunately, the sheer physical girth of the chonky boys that drive these things makes that move impossible so you’ve got to wear them like the ad.
customer_reviews.author: Veteran

customer_reviews.title: You want bass? You found it.
customer_reviews.text: Tried a bunch of various brands & models. By far, Sony has the best sound quality. Bass response is the best I have found in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Okinaka

customer_reviews.title: Constant Static Noise
customer_reviews.text: I own multiple SONY audio products, but this has been the first disappointment. Even when not connected to any device, there is a constant static noise that plays. When playing music, the static noise is audible in very quiet parts, and continues a few seconds after audio playback stops before going quiet. I'm not sure if this is a defective product, but all the other Bluetooth earbuds in my house do not have this problem, so interference doesn't seem to be the case.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Spangler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wireless earbuds for daily activities!
customer_reviews.text: I like how versatile these earbuds are! I wear them on my walks, watching videos on my tablet & even watching TV while my husband sleeps without waking him up. They connect very easily, good sound quality, and I like how I can just pop out a earbud & let it hang if I'm having a conversation with someone. I also like charging via USB. They are not noise cancelling but that's ok 👍🏼 Good pair of basic wireless earbuds
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For Bluetooth headphones in this price range I don't see how you can better
customer_reviews.text: MAKE SURE TO USE THE EAR TIPS THAT FIT YOUR EARS TIGHT!! Since these are Noise Isolating headphones. If there is a poor fit then the headphones will sound terrible. Since these are Sony headphones I expected the audio quality to be at least good and I'm pleasantly surprised by the quality of these headphones. Of course Wired Headphones at this price will sound much better but for the Bluetooth headphones the bass response, mids and highs sound great and I haven't had any issues so far with the connectivity or battery life. The rated 15 hours is about right though your mileage may vary. I'd highly recommend these if you're shopping for Bluetooth headphones with great bass
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but the design of the headphones could be better
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the headphones. Decent sound quality and battery life, but the ear buds had hard time staying in place (your ears) when you move. Two button controls/charging ports always drag the weight of the headphones down, pulling the ear buds out of your ears. And the ear buds themselves are not very comfortable. The bottom line is if you are just looking for a pair with decent sound and don't care too much of the comforty, this pair would be okay for you.
customer_reviews.author: X-go

customer_reviews.title: Great. Earpieces could be more comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! I bought them over a month ago and have loved using them. Took them on an airplane to Hawaii... 12 hour flight from Newark. The battery lasts for 16 hours. Easy to charge, and fast. Noise block is great enough, but not completely blocking. Could be more comfortable when I lie down on them. The ear pieces are substantial.
customer_reviews.author: LadyZana

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is MORE than expected. It sounds like I paid a lot of money for this sound quality to put it bluntly. The bass is at the perfect level to wear the sound won't peak or become distorted. These are so worth it. I owned expensive wireless over the ear headphones before these, and these are better hands down. I don't understand why there are so many negative reviews but if you are not too harsh of a critic you will love these. 🥰
customer_reviews.author: Faith Slaton

customer_reviews.title: Very basic
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good, the way the headphones rest is good. But for some reason they will randomly disconnect, even though they're still connected. I'll have to turn off bluetooth and restart the headphones to fix. Tried checking drivers and everything. This is not a distance thing, as I'm seated directly infront of my PC. This may be a PC thing and they might be good for mobile, I don't know. I can't return them because I ripped them in half in a fit of rage. Sony's days as a top source for your entertainment needs are gone.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Young

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, soft neck
customer_reviews.text: Nice set here. Good sound, good mic, good all around quality. My only issue is that the neck is soft so the set tends to slide to one side or the other as I move. Being that I wore these as I worked, they really weren't a great fit for me as they just seems to slide right off my neck. I could see the flimsy neck being an issue with any physical activity really. Just keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Rebelyell

customer_reviews.title: Happy I got these.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is exceptional. I have used these mostly at the gym. They block out peripheral noise offer decent sound ( for the price is say the sound is excellent). They stay in my ears while running as well. They few times I have used them not at the gym, they offered great sound quality and were comfortable in my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Dropkick Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Sony WI-XB400....Great Sound with solid bass!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound with amazing bass for such a small "speaker". The phone mic works good too as long as you have the loop hanging in front of your body and not over your shoulders behind your head. Battery life is exceptional. It seems to withstand water emersion so far after dropping it in the pool it still works! Not that I reccommend this type of mishap intentionally but good to know.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good quality easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Product provides very good sound quality and does a nice job with noise cancellation. Easy to use features with good blue tooth connectivity. Strong battery life. Some dislikes: when calling, doesn't always stay connected as default so oftentimes I have to manual select the wireless on the iPhone. A bit irritating. Also noticed that when dialing, it has a tendency to lower the IPhone ringer volume. Also a bit irritating. Almost gave it a 3 star because of these irritants. It's not like a Sony product to behave this way.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and battery, whole lot of wire.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing battery life, comfortable, sound great. Only downside is how much wire there is. Magnets are a little weaker than needed when at work. Also, I need to leave one side out so I can hear my coworkers. I would have gotten "air pods" but this battery life sold me. Pairing is easy. I got two sets. One for home and one for work.
customer_reviews.author: Rupert White

customer_reviews.title: A Great Pair of Headphones
customer_reviews.text: The audio quality is great for the price. The construction is pretty good, too. Everything feels nice and the magnets hold together well. The headphones stay in my ear well and do some decent passive isolation. My favorite part is the battery life, which is outstanding! A full day's use and it can still keep going.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew V.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and battery life
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for the battery life and it’s good. Sound is very good as well. Had to return the first pair to Sony since the mic didn’t work. The new pair works well although it disconnects from my iPhone if out of range from the phone for a short time or if music is paused too long. It does not automatically reconnect like my Beats X do.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy P.

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair that only lasted 3 - 4 months
customer_reviews.text: The first pair stopped working in one ear after 3 or so moths. I made the mistake of buying a second pair. after 3 - 4 months I have to reset the headset every morning after a charge and pair the Bluetooth device to get it to connect again. Fool me once.... I would not buy again and strong recommend anyone else to give this product a pass.
customer_reviews.author: Dirtycrow

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of headphones for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These work just fine don't listen to the negative reviews. They're not $200.00 earbuds and that's ok I want more than 3 hour battery life and this gives me 15. The sound isn't bad they feel a little clunky with the bigger battery but it's better than getting wires caught on handles and other stupid stuff.
customer_reviews.author: LMH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound and Battery
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product; I like it more than my previous Bose headset which cost more and whose battery lasted 1/4 of this one's battery life. Bass and midrange are excellent; higher ranges could be a bit less tinny but for the price and the battery which I only charge every 3 days, I am entirely happy with my purchase. The is no noise cancellation feature and I find the size of the ear fixtures a bit unaccommodating but overall, I strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cheio de Gases

customer_reviews.title: Wow... better than BeatsX
customer_reviews.text: After my BeatsX died, I was looking for a similar product: wireless earphone that I can wear around my neck. And..... WOW.... this Sony really delivers... it has a punchy bass just like my old BeatsX, but without BeatsX overprice. BeatsX is $99.95, and this Sony is half of that price. I am happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer from San Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Fair Good
customer_reviews.text: Good battery life. USB-C charger. Audio quality if fair good, but is not crystal perfect. Very depend on source: Apple MBP 2017 flat sound with Ble 4.2, Apple MBA 2019 very good quality with bass. Range is very good. There is some cross talk with mic - you hear yourself after mic is activated
customer_reviews.author: Sergey

customer_reviews.title: Love the earbuds but-
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds are pretty good for what they are, however they sound exactly the same as the "cheaper" WI C310 earbuds just as the advertising says with "EXTRA BASS" Maybe my ears are just fine with anything now but if you want a cheap and also fine pair of earbuds go for the 20 dollar WI C310, if you want the same thing as those earbuds but with just some bass its really not too much but buy these, only when they are on sale though. I dont think these earbuds are really worth the money full price, I got them for around 35 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Dominik Skuta

customer_reviews.title: Weird cable length
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these headphones except the length of the cable connecting the two earbuds. It's like 2 feet long almost. I'm a big guy, and I can put the right earbud in, wrap the cable once around my neck, and put the left earbud in. In fact, if I don't do that, it tends to hang weird off one side of my neck or the other.
customer_reviews.author: Guy on a buffalo

customer_reviews.title: Great performance except for design issue.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about them is great except how easy this style headphone falls out of your ear. Best solution is to loop around your neck but then the microphone is behind you if you take a call it is hard for the person you are talking to to hear you. I like the way they are magnetic when they hang down around your neck.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: It’s June 2020 and I just lost my Soundcore Spirit X earbuds that I really liked. I was thinking about splurging on the Pixel Earbuds 2 that just came out, but I really prefer the string around the neck (I don’t like the idea of a Bluetooth signal going though my BRAIN) I already own the Sony WHXB900N which are rock solid, so I decided to go with these. They sound great and easy to use and they’re under $30. Get them, you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: bbp

customer_reviews.title: Good sound. Bad fit.
customer_reviews.text: Sound was good. Battery life was good. Two issues that make me wish I hadn’t bought these. They fall out of your ears over and over again. The wire between the two earbuds is too long and too heavy so these also makes them fall from your ears. I wore them two times working out, then couldn’t stand it any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: I've returned this item due to poor design. Headphones are not designed for sport activities. Headphones keep falling off. They are designed to be used with minimum body movements. DO NOT buy if you are an active person or want to use for sport activities
customer_reviews.author: A Mubarak

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon had a "flash sale", got these for a great price... and the music sounds better than even going through regular speakers.... Try different ear pads supplied to insure a "snug" fit.... Going on an extended adventure trip and just what I need. I love 'em!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Cattoni

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life, good sound
customer_reviews.text: easily pairs up with devices, a battery that seems to last for several days . Controls work well. The only draw back is that the magnets aren't strong enough to be effective so they might slip off ( I took a small plastic clip off of some old earbuds and problem solved).
customer_reviews.author: Rodbw

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, long lasting battery
customer_reviews.text: These are soooo much better than the cheap ones I wasted my money on before them. The battery lasts a long time. I fly a lot but since the pandemic, I haven't flown in a couple of months. I didn't charge them after my last flight and when I used them the other day, the battery was still full.
customer_reviews.author: Caren C Carter

customer_reviews.title: Too big to fit in my ear.
customer_reviews.text: These would not stay in my ear. There were no options for covers that insert into your ear. I have a hard time with most of the in ear type of headphone, but can usually use a cover that works but not in this case. I did not even try them so I don't know how they sound.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy S. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy in “very good” condition HORRIBLE BUY
customer_reviews.text: Item was stated as very good which means the box is messed up and the item is in perfect condition. These look like a dog chewed on them...and the box. The dog must of eaten the usb3 charging cord and extra ear pieces also because that didn’t come with it either. THE LEFT SIDE DOESNT EVEN WORK!!!! Inspected by Amazon, it’s says so whoever inspected these got an F. Missing 3 things and all scraped up. Never buying a “Very Good” condition product again from Amazon again. Oh the product showed up late as well to top it all off!
customer_reviews.author: Suterthe3rd

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $30
customer_reviews.text: The sound on these earphones isn't too bad except the constant white noise that is always in the background of everything and is even going when nothing is playing. Maybe I got a faulty pair, but that wasn't my only issue. I'm a girl and my ears are small, it's hars to find ear buds that stay in my ears and these did not stay in at all. If I smiled or moved my jaw they would always pop out. I didn't realize how bad they actually we're until I lost them and got ONN ear buds from Walmart on clearance for $5 with just as good sound quality as far as I could tell.
customer_reviews.author: kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Don't stay in your ear or around your neck!!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great...it would probably sound even better if they stayed in your ears 😔. Even with the correct size ear piece they don't stay well if you are moving around and tend to slide all over...which eventually they will slip off and get lost....BUT THE SOUND QUALITY IS GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: terra ruble

customer_reviews.title: Great ear buds for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. At this price, I don't think you can do better. Not ideal for music but for the pricenthey are great. I'm using them all day working from home and I am still at 50% after 8 hours of listening to training demos. I also use them for walking. Or biking.
customer_reviews.author: For You To Read

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life!
customer_reviews.text: These earphones were marketed for delivering good bass and for the price, they do decently well. Of course, if you are looking for really awesome beats, you should go for the more expensive ones. The battery life is also great. It charges fast (in about 2-3 hours for getting fully charged) and comes for about 1.5 days when listened to continuously. The bluetooth range is also extremely decent. In all, for the price, this is a great product and I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Varsha

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding sound!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Sound is fantastic, battery lasts a long, long time. I was comparing them to the U-FLex that I have used for a few years because I own Samsung Galaxy phones. They are superior to the U-Flex. The sound is better. Battery lasts longer. Fully recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alex-Biker

customer_reviews.title: a mixed product that just failed on me
customer_reviews.text: sound and battery life are great. those 2 side pieces are a mess on your neck and I had to buy clips. Product wouldnt stop trying to pair bluetooth at which point it was bricked. I sent it back for a refund. Disappointing to think this is sony quality
customer_reviews.author: Me2

customer_reviews.title: Needs a type c charger
customer_reviews.text: These are nice for the price. I listen to lots of ASMR videos, and I needed something with a easier sound with enough battery life to last throughout the night. I have really noisy neighbors as I live in an apartment, and this has been better than sleeping with earplugs. These are comfortable in the ears as well.
customer_reviews.author: flute player Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Only one thing
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, the only thing I’d say is to add a little cheap piece to hold the headphones so they don’t bounce everywhere for runners... I use a bread tie to hold mine together because if I don’t I have to keep stopping and adjusting because they bounce everywhere and get twisted in each other . Other then that great headphones!
customer_reviews.author: jcavan

customer_reviews.title: very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was super impressed with the price for the quality. the highs and lows and bass sound really well. I definitely couldn't hear anything once music was playing. I bought these for my teens, and they are great. let's just see how long they last. Haha
customer_reviews.author: E.ellis

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Ive tried a ridiculous number of wireless headphones and these are the most comfortable ones ive found so far. The other ones (beats, Samsung and others) end up hurting my ears after a few minutes, but these ones are super comfortable and i can wear them for more than 1 hour.
customer_reviews.author: Shabs_D

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly annoying static sound!!
customer_reviews.text: The build quality and the feel of the product is good but there is this incredibly annoying and loud static sound always playing in the background. Even when nothing is playing, the static sound is worse and ruins the whole experience. Sometimes the static sound will randomly stop but starts again in a few seconds. you can tell that music quality is really good when the static sound turns off but unfortunately its only off for a few seconds and it wouldn’t let you enjoy your music when it comes back. Battery life is really good and earbuds are also comfortable and cancel some of the outside noise. if not for the static sound... this would a GREAT product.
customer_reviews.author: Smit Mistry

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are great for retro music.
customer_reviews.text: As for sound quality it's very dependent on which type of genre of music you're listening to classic Rock like the rolling Stones and Judas priest these headphones are definitely worth it if you are going to listen to rap then you want to consider another purchase. while these have excellent bass these aren't necessarily designed for rap music. these headphones are excellent for analog recording music however electronic dance music and other genres that use a lot of artificial synthesizers you want to consider a different model of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: SONY FOR THIS PRICE IS A GREAT DEAL
customer_reviews.text: I am not the best person for detailed comparisons of EarPods. But I do know that these Bluetooth earphones are well worth the price. Almost always Sony will deliver. So I know that the Apple pods are super cool but also a lot more cost than these excellent EarPods that are also easier to NOT lose.
customer_reviews.author: Major T.Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing! Im all about the bass and these surely deliver! I also have a $400 pair of Boise noise cancelling headphones and these are right up there with them.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Woody

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am a guitarist and definitely an audiophile. I have perfect pitch hearing and can tune an instrument by ear. I honestly have to say from someone who has a house full of Bose speakers, these headphones are amazing. I found a new place in my heart for Sony. Great product and great price.
customer_reviews.author: MP401

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Extra bass?? I have gotten more bass out of $10 headphones. These do not have the quality you would expect from Sony. Sound quality is sub par. For there to be enough bass you have have to turn them up to a point where the highs are unbearable. When on calls the microphone feeds sound back into the headphones which makes phone calls impossible. There is a hissing sound in the background when these are turned on. When wearing them as shown in the product photos the volume up is on the bottom of the control pad and volume down is on the top, bad design. Do not but these!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon H.

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: The sound isn't great, they can't stay in when running, and overall they were buggy. Go with the other major brands alternatives if you want a nice headset.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Thacher

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special here...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special..sound is kinda hollow sounding..extra bass !? I didnt notice any..battery life is pretty decent..thats it! UPDATE !!! after a week and some,ive noticed the headphones drop bluetooth connection quite frequently !
customer_reviews.author: Dan O

product_meta.title: Sony WI-XB400 Wireless In-Ear Extra Bass Headset/Headphones with mic for phone call, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackPortable, lightweight, and comfortable wireless headphones packed with extra bass, 12mm drivers for crisp sound, and up to 15 hours of battery life. Versatile and practical, these soft, flexible headphones go anywhere you do with a stylish, compact design. The integrated microphone makes hands-free calling a breeze. Frequency Response (Bluetooth Communication) - 20 Hz–20,000 Hz (44.1 kHz Sampling).
feature_bullets: Feel the power of extra bass
Up to 15 hours of battery life with Quick charging (10min charge = 60min of playback) Battery Charge Time - Approx 3 hrs (Full charge)
12mm driver units for crisp clear sound
Hands-free calling and voice assistant compatible

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars7,397 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
